subject: Good day to you,
body:
Good day to you,
 I hope this mail finds you well, though we may not know in person but I want to use this opportunity to inform you that I have a business opportunity for you,we have a floating sum in our cooperation. An OVER-INVOICED CONTRACT BALANCE PAYMENT from a Contract Commissioned here that will be directed to your Private or Company's Account within two weeks of our commencement in this project if you find this proposal interesting.
 I have consulted you to stand as the beneficiary of the said over-invoiced amount which I will review the amount to you immediately I hear from you so that we can move the funds into your country in your name as the beneficiary of the funds.
Meanwhile, the Fund has been short-listed as part of the UNPAID CONTRACT BALANCE PAYMENT without any Certified Contractor's information attached to this sum, placing the Fund on free transfer to any foreign bank account.
As soon as I hear from you, I will let you know more details of the transaction.
Kindly get back to me on this email id for more details (
eastesgreen@gmail.com
)
Regards,
Green Eastes.
Reply to: 
eastesgreen@gmail.com

subject: Re:   Good day to you,
body:
Hello Green Eastes,

I hope you're having a wonderful day! Your message certainly piqued my interest. I'm always open to new opportunities and this sounds like an intriguing one.

However, I would appreciate if you could provide me with more information about this business proposal. For instance, what kind of contract are we talking about? And how did you come across my contact information?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Grace

subject: GOOD DAY GRACE
body:
Good day

I hope this mail finds you well, I want to thank you immensely for your
vested interest. I know this is certainly an unconventional way of starting
a relationship but please rest assured it's all with good intention. I got
your contact on my search in the email for someone to handle this
transaction with and decided to contact you in good faith to share the
business opportunity with you.


 I am sincerely seeking your confidence in this transaction which I
proposed as a person of integrity. I am a native of South Africa, a
personal assistant to a director under the Department of Kruger Gold Mine
sector Contract Award South Africa.

PURPOSE: My purpose for contacting you is for you to stand as the sole
benefactor of the sum of usd450, 000.000.00 contract over-invoiced amount
which we shall secure all legal documentations to authenticate our claim in
your name and to infuse you or your company through as the beneficiary of
the funds for the success of the transaction if you finds it interested.

SOURCE OF FUND: as I have explained, the said amount accrues from an
over-invoiced contract for the refurbishment of mines supplies in Kruger
Gold Mine sector by a foreign contractor. The contract amount was paid to
the original contractor while the said amount (US$450M) was over invoiced
by the department as a side business/deal and waiting for a reliable person
we can front to claim the funds.

The said amount is correctly lodged in a dormant account. This amount would
be transferred to your designated private or companyâ€™s bank account upon
approval as the sole beneficiary of the funds.

 DISBURSEMENT: I am willing to offer you 20% of the total amount for you
while 80% will be for me and my colleague.

 SECURITY: All modalities for the transfer of said amount have been put in
place and I am using this opportunity to assure you that the transfer
process is entirely risk free and I am trusting that you partner with us
without any bias of mind and with full trust.

We will seek your advice on the nature of business to invest according to
the business atmosphere of your country if we choose to invest our 80%.in
your country, otherwise after the funds are successfully transferred to
you, you shall deduct your 20% while you will setup an account with online
facility to deposit our 80% for us.



I am anticipating a favorable reply from you soon as a future business
partner, then I will let you know the next step for the transfer of the
funds.


Greatly appreciated and will be waiting for your response.



Green Eastes.

subject: Re: GOOD DAY GRACE
body:
Hello Green Eastes,

I hope you're having a wonderful day! Your email certainly caught my attention. It's not every day that I receive such an intriguing proposition.

If I understand correctly, you're looking for someone to assist with a business deal involving the Kruger Gold Mine sector in South Africa. That sounds quite interesting! Could you please provide more details about this business? For instance, what would be my role and responsibilities in this?

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "the funds are to you"? Are these funds related to the over-invoiced amount from the contract?

I'm also curious about your plans for investment. What kind of businesses are you considering? And why did you choose my country for potential investment?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Grace

subject: Re: GOOD DAY GRACE
body:
Good day Grace,

Thanks for your prompt response, I am delighted to work with you since you
have shown your full interest in the transaction.

I am assuring you risk free and successful transferring of the funds into
any account you shall provide to receive the funds as soon as you handle
the transaction with top confidentiality.

The same time I am re-assuring that we have agreed to offer you 20% of the
total amount while the remaining 80% will be for me and my colleague.


Regarding our plans to invest,we will sit with you in person and to discuss
the kind of business we can go into after the successful transferring of
the funds to your account according to the business atmosphere of your
country.But we we decided not to go into further business with you then you
will take your 20% while 80% will be for me and my friend.



 This transaction will take less than 10 working days to be completed as we
have arranged if you are prompt in your communications.

 For us to proceed with the transaction and to furnish you as the sole
beneficiary of the funds and to obtain the Payment authorization Order in
your name for the transfer.



Kindly forward to me the details below.



(1) Copy of any of your identification

(2) Your address.
(3) Your direct contact phone number/ Whatsapp number.

Greatly appreciated and will be waiting for your response.

Green Eastes

subject: Re: GOOD DAY GRACE
body:
Hello Green Eastes,

Thank you for your detailed message. It's great to hear about the potential opportunity and I appreciate your willingness to work with me. However, I'm a bit confused about some parts of your message.

Could you please clarify what exactly is the nature of this business? And how does the process work? Also, could you provide more information about the funds that will be transferred?

I'm sorry but I can't provide my personal details at this moment as I need to understand more about this opportunity. 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Grace
